attributes.action: Change e-petitions so that you can sign multiple petitions in one & introduce a ‘sign against'
attributes.additional_details:
Change e-petitions so that you can sign multiple petitions at once & introduce  a ‘sign against;

Wouldn’t it be great if you could mark any number of petitions, add in your details once and sign all of them at the same time?  When you get your confirmation e-mail, all signatures would be confirmed with a single action.

It would increase the amount of participation significantly.

I also recommend that e-petitions not only have a signature ‘FOR’, but also ‘AGAINST’.  This would allow citizens the ability to vote down a motion, just like they do in the Houses of Parliament.  It would take away the need to create a separate petition that directly opposes the first.
